DOC.brief_summary: Develop prospective register assess short- long-term complication patient undergo interventional rhythm
DOC.detailed_description: To assess fate patient undergone technical procedure Cardiology Plate ( implantation / extraction pacemaker , defibrillator , radiofrequency ablation cryo-ablation , leave auricle closure , electro- Physiological exploration ) , determine prognostic factor / marker population .
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo : Implantation cardiac pacemaker cardiac defibrillator Extraction pacemaker / defibrillator housing probe Realization radiofrequency / cryoablation : Atrial fibrillation Focus ventricular tachycardia An accessory Any electrophysiological exploration Installation Holter implantable Left auricular closure percutaneously Having formulate nonopposition Minor Patient 's refusal Patients legal protection
